column2: "Well, I am definitely impressed. No offense, but I didn't think you had it in you."
"You're the bona fide real deal, all right. ARKS is lucky to have you."
"I hope you keep up the hard work. Both ARKS and everyone in general will be better off for it."
"Plus, that means I get to kick back and take it easy for a while. Heh."
